StepParameter.Name: storekind
StepParameter.CommandText: select * from member_product where plat = 1 and productCategory = 1 and status = 1 and tag like '%,1,%' and startTime <= now() and endTime > now() order by createTime desc limit 0,10

StepParameter.Name: storekind
StepParameter.CommandText: select * from member_product where plat = 1 and productCategory = 2 and status = 1 and tag like '%,1,%' and startTime <= now() and endTime > now() order by createTime desc limit 0,10

StepParameter.Name: storekind
StepParameter.CommandText: select * from member_product where plat = 1 and productCategory = 3 and status = 1 and tag like '%,1,%' and startTime <= now() and endTime > now() order by createTime desc limit 0,10

StepParameter.Name: storekind
StepParameter.CommandText: select * from member_product where plat = 1 and productCategory = 4 and status = 1 and tag like '%,1,%' and startTime <= now() and endTime > now() order by createTime desc limit 0,10

StepParameter.Name: storekind
StepParameter.CommandText: select * from member_product where plat = 1 and productCategory = 1 and firstLetter in('A','B','C') and status = 1 and tag like '%,1,%' and startTime <= now() and endTime >now() order by createTime desc limit 0,10
